name: Storing the World's Most Valuable Virtual Assets with NFT.Storage
description: The metaverse is here. Where is it all being stored?

content.text/markdown: The last year has witnessed the explosion of NFTs onto the worldâ€™s mainstage. From fine art to collectibles to music and media, NFTs are quickly demonstrating just how quickly grassroots Web3 communities can grow, and perhaps how much closer we are to mass adoption than we may have previously thought. <... remaining content omitted ...>
